      • Default

        public static ActionTypes Default()
        Retrieves the default action registry.
        Returns:
        A default action registry.

      • getTypes

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> getTypes()
        Retrieves a collection of every registered action type.
        Returns:
        Collection of every registered action type.

      • getType

        public java.lang.Integer getType(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves a registered action type by name, or NULL if no such type could be found.
        Parameters:
        name - - name of the action type to find.
        Returns:
        Unique ID of the action type, or NULL if not found.

      • register

        public int register(java.lang.String... names)
        Registers an action type with a list of names. Names should use the ENUM naming convention.
        Parameters:
        names - - names of the given action type.
        Returns:
        Unique ID of the registered action type.

      • register

        public void register(int id,
            java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> names)
        Registers additional names for a given action type. Names should use the ENUM naming convention.
        Parameters:
        id - - unique action type id.
        names - - additional list of synonyms/names for this action.

      • unregister

        public void unregister(int id)
        Unregisters a specified action type.
        Parameters:
        id - - id of the action type to remove.
